attributes.action: introduce an Emergency Alert System to warn citizens of impending natural disasters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the United States, the EAS will override TV broadcasting either locally or nationally to display emergency information of an impending natural disaster or freak weather incident. In order to make the public aware of these quickly and allow them to begin evacuation proceedings, a system like this should be instigated in Britain
